events.message: I recently purchased a jacket but I want to request a refund because it does not fit properly and I would like to return it.
The case is categorized under Refund as the customer is requesting a return and money back for the purchased jacket.
Support agent Jane Doe has been assigned to handle the refund request for the customer.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I'm here to assist you with your refund request for the jacket you purchased.
Could you please provide the order number and the reason for the refund so I can process your request quickly?
Sure, my order number is 789456123 and the jacket is too tight around the arms, so I would like to return it for a refund.
We have processed your refund request. Please use the pre-paid return label sent to your email to send the jacket back and the money will be credited to your account within 5-7 business days.
Thank you for the quick response and clear instructions. I appreciate the help and will send the jacket back today.
Your refund case is now marked as resolved. Let us know if you need any further assistance with the return process.
Just following up to confirm you received the refund for your returned jacket. Please reach out if there are any issues.
We are closing this case now as your refund has been successfully processed. Thank you for shopping with us!
